nodes.text: This male individual was the son of Lady Comali, and served as a guard for Queen Trios of Shu-Torun. At some point, he died protecting Trios. During the Rebel Alliance's mission to Shu-Torun, Trios crossed paths with Lady Comali at a party in the Abyssal Rooms as she was leaving, and mentioned Comali's son to her, and that she understood she was still mourning for him.
